Job Description: Hi,Greetings!Amnex Infotechnologies (formally known as Infinium Solutionz Pvt Ltd.) is one of the fastest growing technology companies in India headquartered in Ahmedabad. The core strength of Amnex Infotechnologies is in building up home grown technology solutions in IoT, automation, mobility, GIS and smart city specific solutions encompassing waste management, transit, smart lighting, smart parking to name a few.Amnex Infotechnologies has been focused towards addressing the needs of industry verticals like agriculture, mining, ports, urban transportation and smart cities. With current employee strength of 500+, Amnex Infotechnologies has it state of the art technology development center in Ahmedabad.
